action_definition.name: run_shell_command
action_definition.description: Run shell commands in a persistent session. Supports standard bash features.

parameter.description: The command line string to execute.
Set to true if sending input to an already running interactive process.
Session identifier to target specific terminals (Default: Your Agent ID). Use this to create separate parallel sessions.
If true, sends the command without a trailing newline (useful for TUI interaction).

returns.description: Execution result including stdout, stderr, and exit status.
